entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The headmaster of Hogwarts who asks Crouch to explain how he escaped from Azkaban.

entities.name: crouch
entities.description: A wizard who is being questioned by Dumbledore about his escape from Azkaban.

entities.name: azkaban
entities.description: A maximum-security prison for wizards and witches.

entities.name: polyjuice potion
entities.description: A magical potion that allows the drinker to take on the appearance of another person.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: A house-elf who is present during Crouch's explanation and tries to stop him from saying more.

entities.name: barty crouch sr
entities.description: Crouch's father, who helped him escape from Azkaban by disguising him as himself.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Foul creatures that guard Azkaban and can sense the emotions of those around them.

relationships.description: Crouch escaped from Azkaban with the help of his father.
Barty Crouch Sr used Polyjuice Potion to disguise himself and his son.
Crouch took a draft of Polyjuice Potion containing one of his mother's hairs.
